languages.text: "Благодарю за доверие, Лорд-капитан. Мы не подведем. Инфернусы знают, что такое счастье служения и доблесть самопожертвования. Мы вырастим вам настоящих героев". {n}Монтэг ослепительно улыбается, и подростки отвечают ему преданными восхищенными улыбками.{/n}

"Thank you for your trust, Lord Captain. We won't waste it. The inferni know all about taking pride in service, courage, and self-sacrifice. We'll make true heroes out of them for you." {n}Einrich beams at the orphans, and they smile back at him with enraptured devotion.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Благодарю за доверие, Лорд-капитан. Мы не подведем. Инфернусы знают, что такое счастье служения и доблесть самопожертвования. Мы вырастим вам настоящих героев". {n}Монтэг ослепительно улыбается, и подростки отвечают ему преданными восхищенными улыбками.{/n}

"Thank you for your trust, Lord Captain. We won't waste it. The inferni know all about taking pride in service, courage, and self-sacrifice. We'll make true heroes out of them for you." {n}Einrich beams at the orphans, and they smile back at him with enraptured devotion.{/n}

"Thank you for your trust, Lord Captain. We won't waste it. The inferni know all about taking pride in service, courage, and self-sacrifice. We'll make true heroes out of them for you." {n}Einrich beams at the orphans, and they smile back at him with enraptured devotion.{/n}

languages.text: "Danke für Euer Vertrauen, Lord Captain. Wir werden Euch nicht enttäuschen. Die Inferni wissen alles über Stolz, Mut und Opferbereitschaft im Dienst. Wir werden für Euch wahre Helden aus ihnen machen." {n}Einrich strahlt die Waisenkinder an, die sein Lächeln mit verzückter Zuneigung erwidern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your trust, Lord Captain. We won't waste it. The inferni know all about taking pride in service, courage, and self-sacrifice. We'll make true heroes out of them for you." {n}Einrich beams at the orphans, and they smile back at him with enraptured devotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Danke für Euer Vertrauen, Lord Captain. Wir werden Euch nicht enttäuschen. Die Inferni wissen alles über Stolz, Mut und Opferbereitschaft im Dienst. Wir werden für Euch wahre Helden aus ihnen machen." {n}Einrich strahlt die Waisenkinder an, die sein Lächeln mit verzückter Zuneigung erwidern.{/n}

languages.text: « Merci pour votre confiance, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous ne vous décevrons pas. Les inferni savent mieux que personne ce que c'est que de puiser de la fierté dans le travail, la bravoure et le sens du sacrifice. Nous ferons de ces enfants de véritables héros à votre service. » {n}Einrich adresse un sourire rayonnant aux orphelins, qui le lui rendent avec une dévotion extatique.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your trust, Lord Captain. We won't waste it. The inferni know all about taking pride in service, courage, and self-sacrifice. We'll make true heroes out of them for you." {n}Einrich beams at the orphans, and they smile back at him with enraptured devotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Merci pour votre confiance, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Nous ne vous décevrons pas. Les inferni savent mieux que personne ce que c'est que de puiser de la fierté dans le travail, la bravoure et le sens du sacrifice. Nous ferons de ces enfants de véritables héros à votre service. » {n}Einrich adresse un sourire rayonnant aux orphelins, qui le lui rendent avec une dévotion extatique.{/n}

languages.text: «Gracias por la confianza, Lord Capitán. No le fallaré. Los inferni sabemos mucho sobre enorgullecernos de nuestro servicio, valor y autosacrificio. Los convertiremos en héroes para usted». {n}Einrich sonríe ampliamente a los huérfanos, que le devuelven la sonrisa con devoción.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your trust, Lord Captain. We won't waste it. The inferni know all about taking pride in service, courage, and self-sacrifice. We'll make true heroes out of them for you." {n}Einrich beams at the orphans, and they smile back at him with enraptured devotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Gracias por la confianza, Lord Capitán. No le fallaré. Los inferni sabemos mucho sobre enorgullecernos de nuestro servicio, valor y autosacrificio. Los convertiremos en héroes para usted». {n}Einrich sonríe ampliamente a los huérfanos, que le devuelven la sonrisa con devoción.{/n}

languages.text: 「ご信頼に感謝します、ロード・キャプテン。無駄にはしません。インフェルヌスは奉仕に、勇気に、自己犠牲に誇りを持つ意味を熟知しています。私たちが彼らを真の英雄にしてみせましょう」{n}アインリッヒが孤児たちへと笑みを向けると、孤児たちも恍惚とした表情で微笑み返してくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your trust, Lord Captain. We won't waste it. The inferni know all about taking pride in service, courage, and self-sacrifice. We'll make true heroes out of them for you." {n}Einrich beams at the orphans, and they smile back at him with enraptured devotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ご信頼に感謝します、ロード・キャプテン。無駄にはしません。インフェルヌスは奉仕に、勇気に、自己犠牲に誇りを持つ意味を熟知しています。私たちが彼らを真の英雄にしてみせましょう」{n}アインリッヒが孤児たちへと笑みを向けると、孤児たちも恍惚とした表情で微笑み返してくる。{/n}

languages.text: “感谢您的信任，舰长大人，我们不会辜负您的信任。我们控火行会最了解何为侍奉、勇气、自我牺牲，我们会把这些孩子塑造成真正的英雄。”{n}艾因里奇对孤儿们露出了笑容，那些孤儿也向他微笑着，笑容中带着狂热的奉献精神。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your trust, Lord Captain. We won't waste it. The inferni know all about taking pride in service, courage, and self-sacrifice. We'll make true heroes out of them for you." {n}Einrich beams at the orphans, and they smile back at him with enraptured devotion.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “感谢您的信任，舰长大人，我们不会辜负您的信任。我们控火行会最了解何为侍奉、勇气、自我牺牲，我们会把这些孩子塑造成真正的英雄。”{n}艾因里奇对孤儿们露出了笑容，那些孤儿也向他微笑着，笑容中带着狂热的奉献精神。{/n}

languages.text: "Güveniniz için teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan. Bunu boşa harcamayacağız. İtfacılar; hizmet, cesaret ve fedakârlıkla iftihar etmeyi çok iyi bilirler. Sizin için onları hakiki kahramanlara dönüştüreceğiz." {n}Einrich, yetimlere gülümsüyor. Yetimler de coşkulu bir bağlılıkla gülümsemesine karşılık veriyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Thank you for your trust, Lord Captain. We won't waste it. The inferni know all about taking pride in service, courage, and self-sacrifice. We'll make true heroes out of them for you." {n}Einrich beams at the orphans, and they smile back at him with enraptured devotion.{/n}
